text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's finally here… 
This is the day!!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It was a long, long… no, it 
wasn't. It was a short, short journey. 
Because it was short distance races.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But now is the time! 
The finish line!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Today, in this Takamatsunomiya Kinen, 
I'll face Ms. Flower again!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'll want to win by a landslide, which 
means we should be aiming for a lead of 
a thousand lengths!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: With that kind of overwhelming victory――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It'll be time to start Bakushin-ing to 
the Tenno Sho and Arima Kinen!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So, from now on, I'll be able to compete
in races other than short distance ones!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
One more time!! 
You can say it, can't you!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I heard it from you, right here! 
Well, then, I'll be going!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Ms. Bakushin O. 
To be with you again is really―

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Today, I will risk my career as class 
president to best you by 1000 lengths!
